ygData.subject: Dragon Tooth Choker broken/missing?
ygData.msgSnippet: For some time now, I think the patch before these two latest one, Wenglaks (sp?) from Kael Drakkal has been missing. I know he is a part of 2 quests at least.
ygData.messageBody:
For some time now, I think the patch before these two latest one, Wenglaks
(sp?) from Kael Drakkal has been missing. I know he is a part of 2 quests at
least. I think one is for receiving the Shrine key into Cobalt Scar, and the
other I believe is for the Dragon Tooth Choker. Now I want one of these (had
to take a faction hit for killing the stupid drake there). Sentry Kale gives
you a note to give to Weng, who's MIA. Giving what he gives you back must be
returned to Kale, or spawns the spy in Skyshrine in a spot at the base of
the steps that lead up to the higher levels of the shrine. What drops from
the spy is returned to Kale for the Choker, if memory serves me correctly.
OK, the question is, where in the heck is wenglaks, why has he been missing
for several patches. People can't get their shrine key without taking a
faction hit, nor can this quest be completed. Has anyone heard what's going
on, or have they moved Weng to another portion of Kael, harder to get to? As
it was the guy was relatively close to the zone, although I'm not sure if
the other guys in the room would pounce on you or not. /sigh

It could be like the NoS when they moved the loot table to Howling stones
from Dalnir. They may have just made it a dropped item rather than
quested....

Pava
CT
